column5: foodland has a great deal on until the 10th. For 19.99 you get 4 store made subs,a choice of macroni,potatoe or coleslaw salad,350 gram package of store baked cookies,a family size store brand bag of  chips,and either a 4L bottle of water or 2L bottle of pop and then a day pass for any provincial park.  Great deal for a lunch and use the pass until October.  I used one it covered lunch for the day for the family and then paid for the ramp fees i used inside a provincial park.
That's a cheap day out, lunch included!
Free park pass? I thought there was no charge to get into any of the parks this year. Sounds like a great deal on the food though!

Free park pass? I thought there was no charge to get into any of the parks this year. Sounds like a great deal on the food though! If you signed up for the pass giveaway then yes.  If you didn't or don't have a pass to borrow then yeah you are paying.
No charge for National Parks if you order a free pass on-line.  Covers entry only.  Good deal from the OP.
This is for provincial parks, not national.  The free pass giveaway at the start of the year was for Parks Canada national parks only, not Ontario parks.

Free park pass? I thought there was no charge to get into any of the parks this year. Sounds like a great deal on the food though!  It's federal parks that are free this year.  The OP said provincial parks.
